results.title: A synthesis on the sub-lethal toxicity of atenolol, a beta-blocker, in teleost fish.
results.text_hl: Data are lacking for behavioral responses to @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@. Molecular biomarkers for @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ may include those associated with @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@, @DISEASE_Cholestasis @DISEASE_MESH:D002779 @@@cholestasis@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertriglyceridemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015228 @@@hypertriglyceridemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Ivantsova E, Martyniuk CJ. A synthesis on the sub-lethal toxicity of atenolol, a beta-blocker, in teleost fish. Environ Toxicol Pharmacol. 2023 Jul 20;():104236. PMID: 37481051
citations.BibTeX: @article{37481051, title={A synthesis on the sub-lethal toxicity of atenolol, a beta-blocker, in teleost fish.}, author={Ivantsova E and Martyniuk CJ}, journal={Environ Toxicol Pharmacol}, pages={104236}}

citations.NLM: Haitas B, Disler LJ, Joffe BI, Seftel HC. Massive hypertriglyceridemia associated with atenolol. Am J Med. 1988 Oct;85(4):586-7. PMID: 3177419
citations.BibTeX: @article{3177419, title={Massive hypertriglyceridemia associated with atenolol.}, author={Haitas B and Disler LJ and Joffe BI and Seftel HC}, journal={Am J Med}, volume={85}, number={4}, pages={586-7}}

results.title: Effects of doxazosin and atenolol on atherothrombogenic risk profile in hypertensive middle-aged men.
results.text_hl: A profile with reduced @<m>DISEASE_Hypertriglyceridemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015228 @@@HTG@@@, increased HDL cholesterol, and improved fibrinolysis was obtained with @CHEMICAL_Doxazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017292 @@@doxazosin@@@ when compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Andersen P, Seljeflot I, Herzog A, Arnesen H, Hjermann I, Holme I. Effects of doxazosin and atenolol on atherothrombogenic risk profile in hypertensive middle-aged men. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1998 May;31(5):677-83. PMID: 9593066
citations.BibTeX: @article{9593066, title={Effects of doxazosin and atenolol on atherothrombogenic risk profile in hypertensive middle-aged men.}, author={Andersen P and Seljeflot I and Herzog A and Arnesen H and Hjermann I and Holme I}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={31}, number={5}, pages={677-83}}
